content: pierwill has marked this topic as resolved.
pierwill has marked this topic as unresolved.

@Eric Huss and @Wesley Wiser: since you've both looked at the issue for this regression test (#87481), do you have any thoughts on why the two PRs above are causing this to fail?

Would this commit make sense as a compromise? https://github.com/pierwill/rust/commit/0f88a1f8f8195b5502d45bbdd75c4d37b3666cdd

Getting backtraces for binaries that don't have debug symbols is very flaky on Windows. I added that test after some modifications I did that made it usually often work to try to prevent us from accidentally regressing.
Let me take a look at the full output for the backtrace and see what's going on.
Which PR should I build locally to get your changes (or does it matter)?
Thanks, @Wesley Wiser ! #89836 would be best :+1:
